longform_article.title: Long-form Article · Deep Dive
longform_article.description: Suitable for 1,500–3,000-word structured long-form pieces, such as newsletter columns, deep dives, and brand long-form articles.

blog_post_standard.title: Standard Article · Regular Update
blog_post_standard.description: Suitable for 800–1,500-word blog or newsletter updates, balancing readability and information density.

knowledge_explainer.title: Explainer / How-to Guide
knowledge_explainer.description: Explainers, product tutorials, and how-to guides for non-expert readers, with clear structure and solid examples.

weekly_report.title: Weekly Work Report
weekly_report.description: Generate a structured weekly report based on this week’s work items, highlighting outcomes, issues, and next week’s plan.

work_summary.title: Work Summary / Project Retrospective
work_summary.description: Monthly/quarterly/end-of-project summaries and retrospectives, emphasizing outcomes, learnings, and reflections.

business_report.title: Business Update Deck Notes
business_report.description: Organize complex business context into a structured write-up for PPTs and meetings.

brief_summary.title: Brief Summary
brief_summary.description: Condense long text into 3–5 paragraphs, preserving key information and conclusions.

structured_outline.title: Structured Bullet Notes
structured_outline.description: Produce hierarchical bullet points for reading notes or meeting minutes.

ad_copy.title: Ad Copy for Performance Marketing
ad_copy.description: Generate multiple high-converting short copies for feed/search ad placements.

landing_page.title: Landing Page Hero Copy
landing_page.description: Create homepage banner copy and key selling-point section copy for products/campaigns.

social_post.title: Short Social Posts
social_post.description: Short-form content and titles suitable for social platforms.

sales_call.title: Sales Conversation Practice
sales_call.description: Generate multi-turn sales dialogue scripts and objection-handling examples.

customer_support.title: Customer Support / Service Dialogue
customer_support.description: Service-oriented dialogue scripts for support, after-sales, and operations scenarios.

story_long.title: Long Story
story_long.description: Create a long-form story with a clear narrative arc—or a speech storyline—based on the topic.

story_short.title: Short Story / Anecdote
story_short.description: Short stories and narrative examples for social media or icebreakers.

style_transfer.title: Style Transfer Rewrite
style_transfer.description: Rewrite while preserving meaning, transferring to a specified tone or brand voice.

simplify_explain.title: Plain-language Explanation
simplify_explain.description: Rewrite technical/obscure content into clear, easy-to-understand explanations.

formalize.title: Formalize into Written Form
formalize.description: Rewrite casual language into formal, standard written style.

polish_only.title: Smart Polishing
polish_only.description: Improve wording, fix grammar, and make expressions more natural for existing text.

polish_and_score.title: Polish + Quality Scoring
polish_and_score.description: Polish first, then score by dimensions and provide improvement suggestions—ideal for important drafts.

business_analysis.title: Business Analysis Report
business_analysis.description: Combine data and context to produce a structured business analysis and recommendations.

scenario_compare.title: Option / Scenario Comparison
scenario_compare.description: Compare multiple alternatives by pros/cons and applicable scenarios.

single_paper.title: Single Paper Deep Read
single_paper.description: Produce an academic-style summary and key-point analysis for a single paper.

multi_paper_review.title: Multi-paper Literature Review
multi_paper_review.description: Create a structured literature review and research thread based on multiple papers.

table_insight.title: Table Data Interpretation
table_insight.description: Parse table fields and structure to output key metrics and trend insights.

metric_explainer.title: Metric Definition & Methodology
metric_explainer.description: Explain metric definitions, calculation methods, and interpretation caveats.

market_brief.title: Market Insights One-pager
market_brief.description: Generate a one-page market insights brief covering the current landscape, trends, and opportunities.

competitor_compare.title: Competitive Landscape Comparison
competitor_compare.description: Compare multiple competitors across features, pricing, and strategy.

interview_script.title: Interview Outline / Script
interview_script.description: Generate a structured interview outline and question list based on topic and interviewee.

interview_minutes.title: Interview Minutes
interview_minutes.description: Turn interview notes into minutes and bullet points, highlighting conclusions and action items.

email_draft.title: Email Drafting
email_draft.description: Generate well-structured, properly toned email drafts in Chinese and English.

email_review.title: Email Review & Edits
email_review.description: Rewrite and improve the user’s draft email and provide brief suggestions.

bilingual_email.title: Bilingual (CN/EN) Email
bilingual_email.description: Generate bilingual business emails with aligned information in both languages.

pitch_script.title: Pitch Script
pitch_script.description: Generate a story-driven pitch script and speaking structure for live presentations.

pitch_slides_outline.title: Pitch Deck Structure & Slide Copy
pitch_slides_outline.description: Output a standard pitch deck slide structure and key copy points for each slide.

decision_brief.title: Decision Brief
decision_brief.description: Organize background, options, pros/cons, and recommended actions into a decision brief.

option_matrix.title: Option Comparison Matrix
option_matrix.description: Compare options by dimensions and generate a structured matrix explanation.

sop_design.title: Process Mapping & SOP Design
sop_design.description: Map process steps from business goals and produce an SOP document.

sop_checklist.title: Execution Checklist
sop_checklist.description: Convert a process into a checklist of actionable tasks for execution.

okr_planning.title: OKR Design
okr_planning.description: Break down KRs, key tasks, and measurement metrics around a goal.

project_plan.title: Project Plan
project_plan.description: Generate a project plan including milestones, task lists, and a timeline.

biz_canvas.title: Business Model Canvas
biz_canvas.description: Generate the key elements and core logic of a business model canvas based on the project brief.

biz_narrative.title: Business Narrative
biz_narrative.description: Create a business narrative using frameworks such as Problem–Solution.

prompt_review.title: Single-Prompt Quality Review
prompt_review.description: Evaluate a single prompt or prompt system, and provide scores and improvement suggestions.

chain_design.title: Task Chain Design
chain_design.description: Break down complex tasks into a multi-step workflow that can map to an agent chain.

agent_decomposition.title: Multi-Agent Task Decomposition
agent_decomposition.description: Decompose goals into roles, responsibilities, and task chains for multi-agent collaboration.

role_spec.title: Role Specification
role_spec.description: Define each agent’s role, inputs/outputs, and boundary constraints.

workflow_blueprint.title: Automation Workflow Blueprint
workflow_blueprint.description: Break a business process into configurable triggers, actions, and conditional steps.

integration_spec.title: Integration Specification
integration_spec.description: Generate a cross-system integration plan with field mappings and trigger conditions.

quality_check.title: Quality & Risk Check
quality_check.description: Score content quality, persona consistency, and risk factors, and provide warnings based on predefined criteria.

policy_alignment.title: Policy & Compliance Alignment
policy_alignment.description: Check whether content touches sensitive areas or violates platform or company policies.

faq_from_docs.title: Convert Docs to FAQ
faq_from_docs.description: Generate FAQ entries from documentation or knowledge cards.

bot_knowledge.title: Bot Knowledge Foundation
bot_knowledge.description: Design a Q&A knowledge base structure and taxonomy for a bot.

ppt_from_doc.title: Convert Long Document to PPT
ppt_from_doc.description: Generate a PPT slide structure and key points per slide from a long document or report.

ppt_outline.title: PPT Outline Design
ppt_outline.description: Output only the section and slide outline for designers to fill in later.

prd_from_table.title: Convert Table to PRD
prd_from_table.description: Convert a feature/requirements table into a structured PRD or product specification.

prd_from_brief.title: Convert Brief to PRD
prd_from_brief.description: Generate a standard PRD structure from a natural-language requirements brief.

paper_abstract.title: Generate Paper Abstract
paper_abstract.description: Create an academic-style abstract for a single paper.

paper_notes.title: Paper Reading Notes
paper_notes.description: Generate reading notes covering the research question, methods, findings, and limitations.

literature_review.title: Multi-paper Literature Review
literature_review.description: Generate a structured literature review and research thread based on multiple papers.

research_design_brief.title: Research Design Brief
research_design_brief.description: Propose a variable framework and research design recommendations around a research question.

course_outline.title: Course Outline
course_outline.description: Generate the overall course structure and unit plan based on objectives and key concepts.

lesson_plan.title: Single-Lesson Plan
lesson_plan.description: Create teaching objectives, lesson flow, and activity design for a single session.

concept_explainer.title: Concept/Theory Explainer
concept_explainer.description: Provide a systematic definition and structured explanation of a concept or theory.

faq_explainer.title: Teaching Q&A
faq_explainer.description: Generate common questions and answers based on core concepts, suitable for post-class Q&A.

tech_plan.title: Technical Solution Planning
tech_plan.description: Design the tech stack, component choices, and a lightweight architecture based on business requirements.

architecture_overview.title: Architecture Overview
architecture_overview.description: Generate a written description of the system architecture, suitable for sharing and review.

issue_diagnosis.title: Issue Diagnosis
issue_diagnosis.description: Analyze symptoms and logs to identify likely causes and a step-by-step investigation path.

postmortem_report.title: Incident Postmortem Report
postmortem_report.description: Generate a postmortem report and improvement recommendations for an incident.
